author: globalvoters.bsky.social
content: Emotional Pidcock laughs off French 'boos' after mountain bike gold: Team GB's Tom Pidcock is emotional after recovering from a puncture to pull off a last-lap pass on the leader from France in the men's mountain bike final at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
